text: Hi :slightly_smiling_face: I am working on the comment module for blogposts. Is there a possibility to show other properties a user has entered other thank name, email and comment?

Did you clone it off of the Hero Banner module, or at some point might have the meta said Hero Banner before you named it Player? A few of us have been having caching issues with different HubSpot modules and properties, and I wonder if this might be something along those lines.
Can anyone give docs on how to specify default content on {% module “rich_text” path=“@HubSpot/rich_text” %}
